chapters.title: Introduction to the Forest Exile
chapters.description: The setting is Panchavati, where Rama, Sita, and Lakshmana live during their exile.

chapters.title: Arrival of Maricha
chapters.description: Ravana sends the demon Maricha to lure Sita away, disguised as a golden deer.

chapters.title: Sita's Desire for the Deer
chapters.description: Sita insists Rama pursue the deer, leading him away from the hermitage.

chapters.title: Lakshmana Leaves the Hut
chapters.description: Sita sends Lakshmana after Rama, leaving her alone in the hermitage.

chapters.title: Ravana's Trickery
chapters.description: Ravana approaches Sita disguised as a hermit and abducts her.

chapters.title: Sita's Resistance
chapters.description: Sita resists Ravana's advances and drops her jewelry to leave clues for Rama.
